question: Read the passage below and choose the most appropriate transition word or phrase to fill in the blank.
text: Early climate models underestimated the speed of glacial melting worldwide. Scientists have refined these models to incorporate more detailed data on ocean currents and atmospheric patterns. _____ the latest projections suggest that sea level rise could occur faster than previously thought.
explanation: Correct choice A: "As a result." This new data in refined models has led to updated, more alarming projections. "Nevertheless" signals a concession, "Otherwise" indicates an alternative scenario, and "In contrast" suggests a difference between two statements, but we need a cause-and-effect transition here.
